name: Discharge Patients
query:
SELECT 
    patient AS "Patient ID",
    patient_name AS "Patient Name",
    gender AS "Gender",
    mobile AS "Mobile",
    scheduled_date AS "Admission Date",
    admission_practitioner AS "Doctor",
    type AS "Department",
    room AS "Room",
    bed AS "Bed Name",
    status AS "Status",
    DATE(discharge_datetime) AS "Discharge Date"
FROM `tabInpatient Record`
WHERE status = 'discharged'
  AND DATE(discharge_datetime) BETWEEN %(start_date)s AND %(end_date)s;
